held up until the entire project is completed* As fast as material
becomes available it should start being exchanged* Certainly
something should be ready for distribution by September 1, I960*
BUDGET
The Ford Consultation money would make the first phase possible*
Even if outside financing does not develop, the ground work for
such an exchange would be laid* It is reasonable to hope that some
exchangeable material will be uncovered in this first phase*
Phases II through V could not be budgeted until after the
Exploratory Phase is completed* The magnitude of the exchange
will depend on the money available*
